nodes.text: The Temple courtyard was a courtyard in the Sith Temple on the remote planet of Kesh. It was used by the Lost Tribe of Sith, who built the Temple in conjunction with the planet's native species, the Keshiri. The courtyard, which stood in the shadows of the nearby Takara Mountains, was decorated with columns, as well as statues of early Sith leaders, including Captain Yaru Korsin. It was also used as a training area for the Tyros and apprentices of the Tribe.
In 41 ABY, the Sith Meditation Sphere, Ship, arrived on Kesh and landed in the courtyard, where it first made contact with Sith Tyro Vestara Khai.
